0.text: Innate: Hecarim gains  bonus attack damage equal to 12% − 24% (based on level) of his  bonus movement speed.
0.html: Innate: Hecarim gains  bonus attack damage equal to 12% − 24% (based on level) of his  bonus movement speed.
markedPassages: bonus attack damage
12% − 24% (based on level) of his  bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Hecarim cleaves his glaive around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 60% against  minions.
0.html: Active: Hecarim cleaves his glaive around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 60% against minions.
markedPassages: minions

1.text: If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with Rampage, he gains a buff for 8 seconds, stacking up to two times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent damaging hits. The buff increases the damage of Rampage by 2% (+ 3% per 100 bonus AD) and reduces the base cooldown by 1, up to a 4% (+ 6% per 100 bonus AD) damage increase and a reduction in 2 seconds of the base cooldown at two stacks.
1.html: If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with Rampage, he gains a buff for 8 seconds, stacking up to two times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent damaging hits. The buff increases the damage of Rampage by 2% (+ 3% per 100 bonus AD) and reduces the base cooldown by 1, up to a 4% (+ 6% per 100 bonus AD) damage increase and a reduction in 2 seconds of the base cooldown at two stacks.

0.text: Active: Hecarim surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies every second.
0.html: Active: Hecarim surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies every second.

1.text: While Spirit of Dread is active, Hecarim is  healed for 30% (+ 2.5% of 100 bonus AD) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to enemies within the area, reduced to 15% (+ 1.25% of 100 bonus AD) for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against  minions and  monsters.
1.html: While Spirit of Dread is active, Hecarim is healed for 30% (+ 2.5% of 100 bonus AD) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to enemies within the area, reduced to 15% (+ 1.25% of 100 bonus AD) for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against minions and monsters.
markedPassages: healed
minions
monsters

0.text: Active: Hecarim becomes  ghosted and gains  25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Hecarim becomes ghosted and gains  25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: ghosted
25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed
25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed
25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed
25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed

1.text: During this time, Hecarim empowers next basic attack to gain 50 − 250 (based on distance traveled)  bonus range and cause him to  dash towards the target's direction,  revealing them for 1 second. If the target remains nearby during the dash, the bonus movement speed is consumed and Hecarim  knocks them back 250 − 450 (based on distance traveled) units, though not through terrain,  stuns them for 0.25 seconds, and deals them modified physical damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on distance traveled).
1.html: During this time, Hecarim empowers next basic attack to gain 50 − 250 (based on distance traveled)  bonus range and cause him to dash towards the target's direction, revealing them for 1 second. If the target remains nearby during the dash, the bonus movement speed is consumed and Hecarim knocks them back 250 − 450 (based on distance traveled) units, though not through terrain, stuns them for 0.25 seconds, and deals them modified physical damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on distance traveled).
markedPassages: bonus range
dash
revealing
knocks them back
stuns

2.text: Devastating Charge  resets Hecarim's  basic attack timer and can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.
2.html: Devastating Charge resets Hecarim's basic attack timer and can critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.
markedPassages: resets
critically strike
(75% +  35%) AD
35%

3.text: Hecarim can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Devastating Charge's duration is paused during  Onslaught of Shadows.
3.html: Hecarim can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Devastating Charge's duration is paused during Onslaught of Shadows.
markedPassages: Onslaught of Shadows

0.text: Active: Hecarim  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target location and summons 5 spectral riders in an arrow formation that charge alongside him in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in their path and  revealing them for 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Hecarim dashes with displacement immunity to the target location and summons 5 spectral riders in an arrow formation that charge alongside him in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in their path and revealing them for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: dashes
displacement immunity
revealing

1.text: Upon arrival, he  fears nearby enemies for 0.75 − 2 (based on distance traveled) seconds, and gradually  slows them by up to 99% over the duration. The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is based on how far the affected units are from Hecarim, having no slow at all from very close range.
1.html: Upon arrival, he fears nearby enemies for 0.75 − 2 (based on distance traveled) seconds, and gradually slows them by up to 99% over the duration. The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is based on how far the affected units are from Hecarim, having no slow at all from very close range.
markedPassages: fears
slows

2.text: The wave of spectral riders travels independently of Hecarim and will always charge at the same distance. Onslaught of Shadows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: The wave of spectral riders travels independently of Hecarim and will always charge at the same distance. Onslaught of Shadows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

Active: Hecarim surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies every second.

While Spirit of Dread is active, Hecarim is  healed for 30% (+ 2.5% of 100 bonus AD) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to enemies within the area, reduced to 15% (+ 1.25% of 100 bonus AD) for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against  minions and  monsters.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second while in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supercharged: For 4 seconds, grants 40% bonus movement speed and ghosting when moving towards a turret or visible enemy champion within 2000 units. After the duration or when an enemy champion is within 225 units, you emit a shockwave, slowing enemy champions within 450 range by 50% for 1.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – SUPERCHARGED: For 4 seconds, grants 40% bonus movement speed and  ghosting when moving towards a  turret or  visible enemy champion within 2000 units. After the duration or when an enemy champion is within 225 units, you emit a shockwave,  slowing enemy champions within  450 range by 50% for 1.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Refuel: Moving and taking damage fills up the Chemtank, gaining stacks. Gain 5 stacks per instance of damage taken from champions and large monsters per cast instance and 1 stack for every 25 units travelled, capped at 10 stacks when travelling by dashes or blinks. At 100 stacks, your next basic attack deals 40 − 120 (based on level) (+ 1% maximum health) (+ 3% movement speed) magic damage to all nearby enemies, increased by 30% against minions and 200% against monsters.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 50 bonus health, and 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REFUEL: Moving and taking damage fills up the Chemtank, gaining stacks. Gain 5 stacks per instance of damage taken from champions and large monsters per cast instance and 1 stack for every 25 units travelled, capped at 10 stacks when travelling by dashes or blinks. At 100 stacks, your next basic attack deals 40 − 120 (based on level) (+ 1% maximum health) (+ 3% movement speed) magic damage to all nearby enemies, increased by 30% against minions and 200% against monsters.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
